main event: A UFO was tracked on radar near Williamsburg, Virginia, observed to hover and then vanish at high speed.
interesting points: The object maintained an altitude of about 2000 feet and a speed of approximately 200 knots,The track lasted from 1530 to 1550, with no known aircraft in the vicinity,The witness estimated the object's size to be 30 to 35 feet in diameter,The object was first seen at 30 degrees above the horizon before moving in a southwesterly direction,No physical evidence was found post-investigation.
witness description: the observer was driving northwest on U.S. Highway 60 and reported unusual weather conditions at the time of observation
